oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Copyprint of William Henry Harrison and Julia Petty Linzy
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Linzys lived in the Greenwood community of Dickson County, Tennessee. During the Civil War, Linzy served as a private in Co. E, 11th Tenn. Inf., CSA. In this photograph, he is wearing his United Confederate Veterans (UCV) pin.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
